dataset_id: BOREAS HYD-01 Volumetric Soil Moisture Data
title: BOREAS HYD-01 Volumetric Soil Moisture Data
summary: Contains the percent soil moisture by volume data that was collected by the HYD-01 group at the various tower sites.
